ygData.subject: Re: One last note
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I can t help with a GG, but I know about reinstalling EQ. Your characters will not be deleted because all of your characters are on the server to stop
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I can't help with a GG, but I know about
reinstalling EQ. Your characters will not be deleted because
all of your characters are on the server to stop
people from hacking the characters from their
harddrives. If you reinstall EQ nothing will happen to your
characeters =)<br><br>P.S. Just as proof, you can play your
characters on another persons computer and since they
wouldn't have your files, it proves that such files do not
exist on your hard drive, only on the server.
